verses.verse: Now Hiram <S%H2438><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and timber <S%H6086><s%> of cedars, <S%H730><s%> with masons <S%H2796><s%> <S%H7023><s%> and carpenters, <S%H2796><s%> <S%H6086><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> him a house. <S%H1004><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> perceived <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had confirmed <S%H3559><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> was lifted up <S%H5375><s%> on high, <S%H4605><s%> because of <S%H5668><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> at Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his children <S%H3205><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H1961><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> Shammua, <S%H8051><s%> and Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Solomon, <S%H8010><s%>
And Ibhar, <S%H2984><s%> and Elishua, <S%H474><s%> and Elpalet, <S%H467><s%>
And Nogah, <S%H5052><s%> and Nepheg, <S%H5298><s%> and Japhia, <S%H3309><s%>
And Elishama, <S%H476><s%> and Beeliada, <S%H1182><s%> and Eliphalet. <S%H467><s%>

And when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> was anointed <S%H4886><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, and went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> them.
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spread <S%H6584><s%> themselves in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> and wilt thou deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into mine hand? <S%H3027><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Go up; <S%H5927><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So they came up <S%H5927><s%> to Baal-perazim; <S%H1188><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them there. <S%H8033><s%> Then David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath broken in <S%H6555><s%> <S%H853><s%> upon mine enemies <S%H341><s%> by mine hand <S%H3027><s%> like the breaking forth <S%H6556><s%> of waters: <S%H4325><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> Baal-perazim. <S%H1188><s%>

And when they had left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> gave a commandment, <S%H559><s%> and they were burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> spread themselves abroad <S%H6584><s%> in the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

Therefore David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him Go not up <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5927><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; turn away <S%H5437><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and come <S%H935><s%> upon them over against <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4136><s%> the mulberry trees. <S%H1057><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when thou shalt hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> a sound <S%H6963><s%> of going <S%H6807><s%> in the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mulberry trees, <S%H1057><s%> that then <S%H227><s%> thou shalt go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle: <S%H4421><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee to smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> therefore did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him: and they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> from Gibeon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1391><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Gazer. <S%H1507><s%>

And the fame <S%H8034><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of him upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>
